post.title: PURI OR POORI RECIPE-FRIED BREAD
post.content:
Puris are fried wheat bread, very common in Indian cuisine served for breakfast. It is a very nice accompaniment to curries as well as snacks.

Ingredients:
  • 2 cups All Purpose Flour or Maida
  • 2 tsp Salt
  • 1 tsp Ghee or Oil
  • 1 tsp Baking powder or baking soda
  • 1 cup Water (or as needed to make a pliable dough)
  • Oil-for frying
Method:
  • Mix together the flour, baking powder and salt thoroughly.
  • Add water little by little to the dough .Knead for 15-20 minutes or until it comes together into a pliable dough. You can also add 1 tbsp hot oil or ghee to the dough. (that you are heating for deep frying).The dough should not be sticky (only very lightly sticky) or feel dry in your hands.
  • Do not let the dough sit as it soaks up lots of oil while frying. Hence use the dough immediately to make the puris.Some say that dough must rest in a humid place like oven for atleast an hour.
  • Make small balls out of it.Roll it out into small circles with thin-medium thickness using rolling pin. Don't make it too thin else it will come out crispy. Let the puris be a little thick so that they will puff up.
  • Repeat for all dough.Heat oil for deep frying.The oil should be hot but not too hot that it smokes.
  • Drop a small piece of dough into the oil. The dough should fry up immediately and come to the surface. You know the oil is not hot enough when the puri does not puff up, is flat and instead is also soaking up oil. Now drop the puri into the oil.
  • While the puri is slowly coming to the surface,keep tapping slowly on the puri with a ladle so that it would puff up. When one side changes color, turn it over and let the other side cook. Make sure you turn the puri just once.
  • Place it on paper towel to drain off any oil. Serve it with side dish of your choice. The famous combo is with Potato Masala and also Chole (chickpeas curry).

post.title: CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES
post.content:
Chocolate Chip Cookies my favorite cookies ,are easy to prepare and are crisp outer and soft chewy inside.Home-baked cookies are favourite treat for everyone.I baked this cookies for my friend and she loved it!!

Ingredients:
  • 2 1/4 cups All-Purpose Flour
  • 1 tsp Baking Soda
  • 1 tsp Salt
  • 1 cup (2 sticks) Butter, softened at room temp (or use 1 stick butter and 1 stick margarine.)
  • 3/4 cup Granulated Sugar
  • 3/4 cup Brown Sugar
  • 1 tsp Vanilla Extract
  • 2 large Eggs
  • 2 cups (12 oz. package) Nestle Toll House Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels
  • 1 cup chopped Nuts (optional)
Method:
  • Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar in a mixing bowl until creamy.
  • Take a large mixing bowl and beat the eggs.To this add the sugar mixture and vanilla essence and whisk well.
  • Gradually beat in the sift flour,baking soda and salt till it becomes like dough.
  • Now add in chocolate morsels and nuts and stir it.
  • Drop and slightly press the cookie dough onto the baking tray lined with parchment paper by rounded tablespoons or an ice cream scoop,so that cookies are in circles for uniform sizing.
  • Bake for 9 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Cool on baking tray for 2 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.
  • Transfer cookies to a nice serving plate when they have cooled.Enjoy the yummy cookies.

Check out the Chocolate chip cookie video.

post.title: WHITE CHICKEN KORMA
post.content:
Enjoy the simple, mild chicken korma with naan or rice. 

Ingredients:
  • 2 boneless Chicken breasts, cubed or Whole Chicken
  • 1/2 tsp whole Cumin seeds
  • 1 Cinnamon stick
  • 2 Cardamom pods
  • 1 medium Onion, chopped finely
  • 1 tsp Ginger and Garlic paste
  • 1/2 cup Sour cream or Yoghurt
  • 1/2 cup Coconut milk
  • 2 tbsp Oil
  • 1 Green chilli
  • Coriander leaves, chopped
  • 1 tsp Cornflour
  • Salt to taste
  • juice of half lemon
  • Almonds for garnishing (optional)
Method:
  • Marinate the chicken in the following spices-1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp red chilli flakes or green chillies, 1/2 tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp ginger and garlic paste, 1 tbsp oil and set aside for a few hours, preferably overnight.
  • Add oil in your pan, followed by the whole spices (cumin, cardamom, cinnamon). Let them splutter then add the chopped onions and fry until slightly golden, then add the ginger and garlic pastes.
  • Fry for a minute, then add the chicken and increase the heat to medium high.
  • Fry for about 5 mins until chicken turns white, then slowly add the sour cream/yoghurt and the coconut milk.
  • Stir well and lower the heat to low, cover the pan and let these simmer for 10mins, giving a stir every now and then.
  • Check the gravy, if you feel you prefer it with a bit extra gravy, then add as much water as you need, and then mix the 1 tsp of flour/cornflour with a bit of water and add it to the dish. This will help thicken the gravy slightly.
  • Add the slit green chilli. Continue to simmer for another 10-15 mins.
  • Once the chicken is nice and tender, turn off the heat, then add the chopped coriander, salt and lemon juice.
  • If you notice, the salt is added right at the end, this helps keep the chicken very moist, flavourful and tender. If you add the salt too early, the chicken pieces will be dry and rubbery.
  • Give the chicken about 5 minutes to let the flavours infuse before serving, you can garnish with some almonds if you like. Serve with rice and naan! :)

post.title: RABRI
post.content:
The perfect creamy and rich Rabri taste divine!.And takes only 30-40 minutes to make it.The traditional way of making rabri takes more than 2 hours.So enjoy the quick and easy rabri.

Ingredients:
  • 1 tbsp Ghee
  • 15 oz Ricotta Cheese
  • 16 oz tin of Evaporated Milk
  • 1/2 cup Sugar
  • 1/4 cup Assorted nuts
  • 1/4 tsp Cardamom powder
  • 7 to 8 Saffron strands
Method:
  • Melt down tbsp of ghee in a wide pan.After ghee is melted to that add ricotta cheese and mix well.
  • Continue to cook ricotta cheese over medium high heat for 10-15 minutes.
  • Cook till ricotta cheese comes together like a dough.
  • Now slowly add evaporated milk and as you add milk make sure you continue to stir it. Mix very well.
  • Add assorted nuts and saffron, mix well and simmer over medium high heat for 5 minutes.
  • Next add sugar, cardamom powder, mix well and cook for 5 minutes
  • Decorate with nuts and serve hot or chilled as a dessert.

post.title: DAL GOSHT(LENTIL AND MEAT) CURRY
post.content:
Dal Gosht is a very tasty mutton dish cooked with lentils and masala.

Ingredients:
  • Split Bengal gram (chana dal),soaked 1/4 cup
  • Split pigeon pea (toor dal),soaked 1\8 cup
  • Split red lentil (masoor dal),soaked 1\8 cup
  • Boneless mutton,cut into 1 inch cubes
  • Oil 2 tbsp
  • Cumin seeds 1/2 tsp
  • Green chilli,slit 2
  • Ginger and Garlic paste 1/2 tbsp
  • Onion ,chopped 1 large
  • Tomato,chopped 1 medium
  • Salt to taste
  • Red chilli powder 1 tsp
  • Coriander powder 1 tsp
  • Cumin powder 1 tsp
  • Turmeric powder 1/4 tsp
  • Garam masala powder 1/4 tsp
  • Lemon juice 1/2 tbsp
  • Fresh coriander leaves,chopped
Method:
  • Heat the oil in a pressure cooker. Add the cumin seeds and green chillies and sauté till the cumin seeds begin to change colour.
  • Add the ginger and garlic paste and saute for half a minute. Add the onion and saute till golden brown. Add the tomato and salt and continue to saute for two more minutes. Add the chilli powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder and mutton and saute for two minutes.
  • Stir in the garam masala powder. Add one cup of water and bring to a boil. Seal the cooker with the lid and cook till the pressure is released twice (two whistles).
  • When the pressure has reduced completely, add the soaked dals and four and a half cups of water.
  • Bring to a boil, cover the pressure cooker and cook under pressure till the pressure is released eight to ten times (eight to ten whistles).
  • Once again allow the pressure to reduce. Remove the lid, stir and mash the dals lightly. Stir in the lemon juice and coriander leaves and simmer for five minutes. Serve hot.
  • Serve hot.

post.title: ALOO TIKKI(POTATO CUTLET)
post.content:
Aloo Tikki, a popular Indian snack that can be served at tea-time with the sauce or chutney of your choice.

Ingredients:
  • 3 white Potatoes
  • Cumin seeds (zeera), roasted
  • 1/4 Onion choppped finely
  • Salt to taste
  • Red chilli flakes or Green chilli
  • Coriander leaves, chopped finely
  • 1 Egg, beaten
  • Oil for shallow frying
Method:
  • Wash and quarter the potatoes.Bring a large pot of water to boil.
  • Cook potatoes in pot of boiling salted water for 10 to 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender when pierced with a fork.
  • In the meantime, place a small non stick frying pan on high heat, add cumin seeds and swirl the pan gently, in order to make sure the seeds are roasted uniformly. When you can smell the aroma and the seeds begin to darken, immediately remove the pan from the burner. Transfer to a plate to stop the cumin from cooking further.
  • When the potatoes are fork-tender, drain them, and when cool, remove the skin.
  • Mash potatoes with a masher and then with a fork, some lumps may remain, but don’t worry, as this will give a nice texture to the end product.
  • Add roasted cumin seeds, minced onion, salt, chili flakes and coriander leaves.
  • Shape into small patties.
  • Place a large non stick frying pan on medium high heat and oil for shallow frying.
  • Dip each patty into egg mixture and carefully transfer to frying pan. Fry about 40 seconds on each side,till golden.
  • Serve hot with ketchup or mint chutney.

post.title: CAULIFLOWER(GOBI) MANCHURIAN
post.content:
“Manchurian” is an Indian Chinese dish. This is one of the famous starters and it is delicious, spicy and dry or with gravy made of Cauliflower.I enjoy dry manchurian.

Ingredients:
  • 1 medium sized Cauliflower (broken into medium-sized florets)
  • Spring Onion greens chopped, for garnishing
  • Oil for deep frying
  • For Marination:
    • 1/2 tsp Red chilli powder or Green Chilli paste
    • 1/2 tsp Ginger and Garlic paste
    • Salt to taste
    • 1 small Onion, finely chopped
    • For the Batter:
      • 1/2 cup All Purpose Flour
      • 1/4 cup Corn Flour
      • 1/2 tsp Baking Powder
      • 1/4 tsp Salt
      • 3/4 cup Water or as needed
    • For the Sauce:
      • 1/2 cup Sweet & Sour sauce or Tomato Ketchup
      • 1/2 tsp Red chilli or hot sauce
      • 2-3 tbsp Soya Sauce
      • 1/4 tsp Ginger and Garlic paste
      • 1 tbsp Corn flour dissolve with water
      • Salt if needed
    Method:
    • In a bowl mix together ginger and garlic paste,red chilli powder,salt and onion for the marination. Put the cauliflower florets in to the bowl and mix well and keep for about 20 minutes.
    • Meanwhile, mix together all purpose flour,corn flour,baking powder and salt in another bowl. Add the water carefully so that batter has a reasonably thick coating consistency.
    • Next drop the marinade cauliflower into the prepared batter and make sure they're well coated with the batter.
    • Heat the oil for deep frying. Carefully drop the cauliflower into the hot oil and deep fry over medium heat, till they're crisp and a nice brown in colour. Remove and drain on paper towels.
    • For Sauce:
      • Take medium sized pan and add sweet and sour sauce,chilli sauce,soya sauce,ginger and garlic paste
      • Heat the sauce just till it starts bubbling. Add cornflour mixture and mix well. Take the pan off the heat.
      • This sauce should be a bit on the thicker side. If you feel it is too thick, you may add a couple of spoons of water to thin it down slightly, before taking the sauce off the stove.
      • Place the fried cauliflower in a serving bowl and pour the sauce over it. Garnish with chopped spring onion greens and serve warm.

post.title: ACHARI MURGH
post.content:
Achari Murgh is a spicy and hot Chicken that is cooked in spicy North Indian style.

Ingredients:
  • Chicken-boneless or with bones
  • Onions- 1 chopped
  • Ginger and Garlic paste- 2tbsp
  • Cumin powder- 1tsp
  • Coriander powder- 2tsp
  • Red chilli powder- 3tsp
  • Salt
  • Curd -1tbsp
  • Fenugreek seeds- 1/4th tsp
  • Mustard seeds-1 tsp
  • Curry leaves
  • Dry mango powder(amchur)- 1 tsp
  • Red chilli flakes - 4-5
  • Green chillies- 4-5 (slit)
Method:
  • Take chicken and marinate it with ginger garlic paste, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chilli powder, salt and curd.
  • Take fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds,some curry leaves(4-5), dry mango powder and chilli flakes in a grinder. Make a dry paste without water.Add to chicken and leave for one hour.
  • Take some oil( 3-4 tbsp) in a pan. Add some dried red chillies, mustard seeds, curry leaves and stir well. When done add onions and saute for 4-5 mins. Add ginger garlic paste (1tsp), coriander cumin powder-(1tsp) and saute'. Drop in 4-5 slit green chillies too.
  • Add chicken and fry for 4-5 min.
  • Now add little water enough to tenderize chicken and cover the lid.
  • Once done, garnish with coriander leaves and serve hot.

post.title: CHICKEN SPRING ROLLS
post.content:
Spring rolls are light easy appetizer with an exotic flavor.These are easy to make so do check out.

Spring Roll Wrapper Packet

Ingredients:
  • 1/2 pound Ground Chicken
  • 1/2 head of Small Cabbage, shredded
  • 2 Carrots, thin julienne cut
  • 1 Stalk Green Onion, chopped or Onion chopped
  • 1/2 Green,Red,Yellow Bell Peppers,thin julienne cut
  • 2 tsp Soya Sauce
  • 1/4 tsp Sesame Seeds
  • 1 tsp Ginger and Garlic paste
  • 1 tsp Chilli sauce or Red chilli flakes
  • 1/4 tsp Ajinomoto-optional
  • 1 tsp Vinegar
  • Cornstarch or Cornflour-optional
  • 1 tsp All Purpose Flour or 1/2 egg white wash
  • 1/4 cup Water
  • Salt to taste
  • 50 Spring roll wrappers, defrosted
  • Oil, for deep frying
Method:
    • In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce,pepper and cornstarch. Add in the chicken and mix well. Let marinate for 10 minutes (or up to overnight in the refrigerator).
    • Heat a wok or large saute pan over high heat. When hot, add 1 tbsp of the cooking oil.Stir fry the ground chicken until browned. Remove browned ground chicken from wok to a bowl and set aside.
    • Wipe the wok clean and turn heat to medium. When just starting to get hot, add the remaining cooking oil. Add in the green onion,ginger and garlic paste and cook for 30 seconds.
    • Add in the carrots,green bell pepper,red bell pepper,yellow bell pepper and cabbage. Stir well and turn the heat to medium-high. Stir fry the vegetables for 2 minutes,or until the veggies have softened.
    • Add the cooked ground chicken back into the wok, stir well. Add in the soya sauce,chilli sauce or red chilli flakes,sesame seeds,vinegar,ajinomotto and toss again.Cook until the liquid dries off.
    • In a small bowl,add water and all purpose flour and make a smooth paste. Open the spring roll sheet package, cover with barely damp towel to prevent drying out.
    • Add 1 tablespoon of filling to spring roll and roll up. Secure the edge with all purpose flour paste. Keep rolled spring rolls covered with plastic wrap or in ziploc bag to prevent drying.
    •  To fry, heat oil in a wok or deep.Carefully slide in the spring rolls, one at a time, to the oil to fry. Turn the spring rolls to brown evenly and fry for about 3 minutes. Let cool on paper towel.
    • Serve hot with ketchup or Chinese hot sauce.

Enjoy :)

post.title: EGG BIRYANI
post.content:
Egg Biryani, absolutely delicious recipe! A simple to make super recipe of Egg Biryani, that your family will love. An easy and great dish for egg lovers.

Ingredients:
  • 2 cups Basmati Rice
  • 1 tsp Biryani Masala powder
  • Ghee
  • 6 eggs
  • Water
  • 1 tbsp Ginger and Garlic paste
  • 4 Green Chillies
  • Oil
  • 1 Onion large
  • 2 cup Plain Yogurt
  • Salt to taste
  • Whole spices-cardamon,cloves,cinnamon stick,bay leaves and shazeera
  • Fresh Coriander/Cilantro Leaves and Mint leaves-finely chopped
Method:
  • Wash and soak rice for atleast ½ hour.
  • Next boil the eggs and then shell the boiled eggs and give four long cuts on the white portion of each egg without separating it.
  • In a khadhai or pot, heat the ghee or oil.Add whole garam masala spices and onions,fry the onions until they become golden brown and then add ginger and garlic paste ,green chillies ,mint leaves,coriander leaves,biryani masala and curd and cook.
  • And then add 1 1/2 times the amount of water to rice and bring it to boil.
  • Next add the soaked rice and mix well and cook covered till rice is done.
  • Meanwhile take a small bowl add red chilli powder,salt,gram flour(besan), 1 beaten egg and mix well.Next Dip each boiled egg into the mixture and keep aside.
  • Take a pan add butter and fry the eggs for few mins and then remove and keep aside.
  • Now check the rice,when the air holes appear on the rice surface, reduce the stove heat to low. Cook until all of the water has absorbed and the rice is tender.
  • When the rice is cooked top it with eggs.
  • Serve hot.

post.title: PANCAKE
post.content:
Tall, fluffy pancakes are delicious served with maple syrup or honey or top with strawberries and whipped cream for a real treat.

Ingredients:
  • 1 Cup All purpose flour
  • 1 tbsp Sugar
  • 1 tsp Baking powder
  • 1/2 tsp Baking soda
  • Dash of Salt
  • 1 cup Milk
  • 1 Egg
  • 3 tbsp Melted Butter
  • Few drops of Vanilla essence
  • Maple syrup or Honey
Method:
  • In a large mixing bowl, sift together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
  • Using a whisk or large fork, mix in the milk and egg until well combined and smooth. Stir in the melted butter.
  • Heat non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Using a 1/4 cup measure, pour pancake batter onto hot griddle. When pancake is golden brown, flip to cook other side.
  • Serve warm with honey or maple syrup,whipped cream and any fruit compote of your choice.

post.title: CHERRY SHAKE
post.content:
Simple and quick Cherry shake to make and delicious to drink.

Ingredients:
  • 1 cup Cherries desseeded
  • 2cups Vanilla Ice cream
  • 1cup Milk
Method:
    • In a blender,place cherries,vanilla ice-cream and milk.
    • Cover and blend until smooth.
    • Pour into the glass and serve chilled.

Enjoy :)

post.title: VEGGIE PULAO
post.content:
Vegetable pulao makes a delicious and simple main course rice preparation. Best served with raita.

Ingredients:
  • 2 cups Basmati rice
  • 3 cups Warm Water
  • 1 1/2 tbsp Ghee-clarified Butter
  • 1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
  • 2 Cinnamon sticks
  • Bay leaves
  • Cloves
  • 1/2 cup Onion-finely chopped
  • 1/4 cup Green and Red bell pepper-finely chopped
  • 1 tbsp Ginger and Garlic paste
  • 1 tsp Green chilli paste
  • Salt to taste
  • 1/2 cups Diced Carrots
  • 1/2 cup Green peas
  • 1/2 cup Beans
  • Saffron strands
Method:
  • Wash,rinse and soak the Basmati rice in water for 20 mins.
  • Take a pan and add ghee-clarified butter or oil,add cumin seeds,cinnanom stick ,cloves,bay leaves and then chopped onions.Cook the onions till transclucent.
  • Next add green and red bell peppers and let it cook and then add ginger and garlic paste and green chilli paste.
  • Now add the veggies-carrots,green peas and beans.Cover the pan and cook for few mins till the veggies are half done.
  • Next add rice and salt and give a quick stir.Let it cook for few mins.
  • Then add warm water and few saffron strands.Cover and cook till the rice are completely done on low heat.
  • Serve hot with raita or pickle.

post.title: FRUITS CUSTARD
post.content:
Fruits Custard is a very delicious and healthy dessert with the creamy texture of the custard and crunch of the fruits in between.

Ingredients:
  • 1/2 litre Milk
  • 2 tbsp Custard powder
  • Sugar
  • Raw fruits Apple/Banana/Grapes/Oranges/Pomegranate/Mango-Finely chopped
  • Dry Fruits (optional)
Method:
  • Take a saucepan,add milk and bring to boil and then add sugar and stir till it dissolves.
  • Next in a small bowl add custard powder in a small amount of of milk,mix it well without any lumps.
  • Add this custard paste into the boilng milk and keep stirring till its creamy and thicken on a low flame.
  • Remove from heat when it reaches the desired consistency.
  • Allow the custard to cool thoroughly.
  • Finally in a serving dish add the chopped fruits and then pour over the custard cream and refrigerate.
  • Serve cool and Enjoy it!!

post.title: EGG PUFF
post.content:
Puffs are the easiest snack to make and it reminds us of the college days where we use to grab these during break time.Do try out and enjoy!!

Ingredients:
    • Boiled Eggs 4
    • Black Pepper
    • Puff Pastry Sheets
    • Salt
    • Chaat Masala
    • Garam Masala powder-optional
    • Egg wash
Method:
  • Take boiled eggs and cut into half and then sprinkle pepper powder,chat masala,garam masala ,if needed salt.
  • Take puff pastry sheet,place the sprinkled egg on top and close the sheet by applying little water on the edges.
  • Brush the puffs with egg wash for better color.
  • Bake it in the oven for 30 mins at 350 degrees.
  • Once it is done serve with sauce or ketchup.

Check out the egg puff video recipe.

post.title: TOMATO CHUTNEY
post.content:
Spicy and tangy chutney.Simple to prepare no need of grinder.Tastes good with anything.

Ingredients:
  • 3 Tomatoes
  • 1 tbsp Ginger garlic paste
  • 1 tbsp Red chilli powder
  • 1 tsp Turmeric powder
  • 2 Green chillies
  • 4 Curry leaves
  • 1/2 tbsp Cumin seeds (Zeera)
  • 1/2 tbsp Black Mustard seeds(Rai)
  • Salt to taste
  • 2 tbsp Oil
Method:
  • In a large non-stick saucepan/Khadhai add oil at medium heat.Add cumin seeds, black mustard seeds & curry leaves fry for 30 seconds.
  • Then add tomatoes, ginger garlic paste, red chilli powder, turmeric powder,green chilli and mix well.
  • Now after a couple of minutes add salt,do not cook on a high heat,simmer heat and cover the pan leave till smooth.
  • At this stage there will be some liquid from the Tomato in the pan. You need to now stir it till tomatoes gets smooth and mushy.
  • Then cover the pan let it until all the liquid evaporates,leave till done.Remove from the heat.
  • Serve this as side dish with rice and parathas.

post.title: MUTTON BIRYANI
post.content:
Flavorful rice cooked in very tasty, delicious mutton stock. Its aroma is unbeatable when this biryani is ready!

Ingredients:
  • 1lb Mutton cut into big pieces
  • 2cusp Basmati Rice
  • Mint Leaves and Coriander leaves -finely chopped
  • 2tbsp Oil
  • 2tsp Ginger and Garlic paste
  • 1/2tsp Turmeric powder
  • 1tsp Lemon juice
  • Garam Masala powder
  • 1tsp Shazeera
  • Whole Garam Masala-Cloves,Cardamons,Cinnamon sticks ,Bay leaves
  • 1 big Onion-diced thinly
  • Salt to taste
  • 6 Green Chillies
  • Saffron strands
  • Milk
Method:
  • Wash and soak rice in enough water for 30 mins.
  • Wash mutton well and cut in to big pieces. Add ginger and garlic paste in to a bowl, turmeric powder, lemon juice, mint leaves, garam masala powder, coriander leaves, mix well, add mutton pieces in to it, mix well, cover and marinate for 3 hours.
  • And then add marinated mutton into pressure cooker, then add green chillies, salt to taste, 2 cups water and cook till meat is tender.
  • In another pan,heat oil and add onion and fry it till golden color.And then take them out and let it cool for 5 mins and then crush them finely.
  • Add half of onions to the mutton and mix it.
  • In a cooking pot,add water,cloves,cardamons,shazeera,cinnamon sticks and bay leaves and some coriander and mint leaves and bring the water to boil.
  • Once the water starts boiling add the soaked rice and boil it.Once the rice is cooked,drain the excess water and take out rice in a different dish.
  • Now in the main cooking pot,layer half of the rice at bottom and then layer of mutton and then top it with a layer of rice again.
  • Take saffron stands mixed in milk and sprinkle it on the top of rice.Add crushed and fried onions.Cover the lid and leave it on simmer for 10-15 mins.
  • Serve with raita, salad or pickle!

post.title: NUTELLA FILLED STRAWBERRIES
post.content:
Strawberries and nutella are my all time favorite.I have always thought that strawberries and nutella makes a great combination.So the other day I thought,why not fill the strawberries with nutella.

Ingredients:
  • 10 Strawberries
  • 1 cup Nutella for filling
Method:
  • Refrigerate nutella for few minutes.
  • Slice off a tiny bit of top of strawberries.
  • Remove nutella from the fridge and fill the strawberries.
  • Enjoy the strawberries flavored with nutella.

post.title: MICROWAVE PINEAPPLE PASTRY
post.content:
Wishing you all a very Happy Christmas!!.Christmas celebration is all about cakes,pastries and cookies.Enjoy your Christmas with easy and hassle free ending Microwave Pineapple Pastry.

Ingredients:
  • 2tbsp Butter
  • 2tbsp Cream Cheese
  • 1/2 cup Sugar
  • 3/4 cup Warm Milk
  • 1/2tsp Vanilla essence
  • 1 cup All Purpose Flour(Maida)
  • 1/2tsp Baking powder
  • 1/2tsp Baking Soda
  • Tinned Pineapple chunks
  • 1 pack of Cool Whip
Method:
    • Take butter and cream cheese in mixing bowl.To that add sugar and whisk well until it turns out creamy.
    • Slowly add warm milk and make that in to thin paste.Now add vanilla essence and mix well.
    • Sieve maida in to wet mixture along with baking powder and baking soda.Mix very well.
    • Pour the mixture in to greased 8*8 microwave safe Baking tray.Microwave over high power for 4 minutes.
    • After cake is done allow it to cool down for 10 minutes.Then transfer that on to cooling rack.
    • After cake cools down divide that in to two equal size sponge sheets.
    • Take one of the sponge sheet.Apply pineapple juice over that.Apply a layer of cool whip over it.
    • Place few chunks of pineapple over cream layer.
    • Now put another sponge sheet on the top of previous sponge sheet.Now cover the whole cake with cool whip.
    • Put some pineapple pieces on the top of cake and top that up with cherries or strawberries.
    • Slice it in to small pastry cakes!

Enjoy :)

post.title: BUTTER CHICKEN
post.content:
Butter chicken (or murgh makhani) is part of Indian cuisine, popular in countries all over the world.This rich, buttery, creamy chicken is perfect for parties and family gatherings.

Ingredients:
For Marination:
  • Boneless Chicken
  • 1/4 cup Yoghurt
  • 1tbsp Ginger and garlic paste
  • 1tbsp Lemon juice
  • 1/4tsp Turmeric powder
  • 1tbsp Red chilly powder
  • 1/2tsp Garam masala Powder
  • For Gravy:
    • 1tbsp Butter
    • Onion-2
    • Tomato-2
    • 1tsp Ginger and garlic paste
    • 1tsp Chilly powder
    • Almond/Cashew nut-a handful (soaked in water for 15 minutes)
    • Cardamom-2
    • Cloves-2
    • Cinnamon-1stick
    • Pepper corns-1tsp
    • Coriander leaves (chopped)
    • 1/2tsp Sugar
    • 2tbsp Fresh cream
    Method:
    • Marinate chicken with turmeric powder, chilly powder, garam masala, yoghurt ,ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice and salt.Keep it aside for an hour.
    • Heat 1tbsp butter in a pan and saute onions unil translucent.Add ginger garlic paste and saute well another 2 minutes.Add chilly powder and fry for a minute.Now add tomatoes and saute until tomatoes turn soft.Add almonds /cashew nuts and remove from heat.Cool completely and grind it into a smooth paste.
    • Heat 1 tbsp butter in a pan or pressure cooker and fry cardamom ,cloves,cinnamon and pepper powder.Add ground paste,3/4 cup water,sugar and salt.
    • When it starts boiling add marinated chicken and coriander leaves.
    • Cover and cook on medium heat or pressure cook for one whistle,until desired consistency is reached.
    • Switch off the flame and finally add fresh cream.Mix well
    • Garnish with fresh cream and coriander leaves.
    • Serve with chapathi,rice,parathas,or naan.

post.title: CHOCOLATE BISCUIT PUDDING
post.content:
Chocolate biscuit pudding- a deliciously rich dessert perfect for chocaholics!

Ingredients:
  • 500ml milk
  • half tin condensed milk
  • 1 tin nestle cream
  • 3tbsp cocoa powder
  • 1 tsp vanilla essence
  • 2 Hide and Seek biscuit packets or any biscuits of your choice
  • Few crushed almonds and pistachios for garnishing
  • Some chocolates
Method:
    • Take a pot and pour the milk in it along with condensed milk, cocoa powder, cream and vanilla essence.
    • Bring it to boil and cook it properly.. keep cooking it until it becomes thick.. like that of the consistency of the custard.. not too thin but not too thick either, turn the stove off and take the pot off the stove.
    • Now take a serving dish and layer the biscuits
    • Next, pour half the hot pudding onto the layered biscuits
    • Sprinkle some almonds and pistachios over this
    • Keep continuing these layers and that's it!
    • refrigerate it until well chilled and serve it with vanilla ice-cream or whipped cream. —

Enjoy :)

comment.title: re: CHOCOLATE BISCUIT PUDDING
comment.content: I'm pleased to finally read a post where you say what you really think.

post.title: PEA PULAO
post.content:
Pea Pulao is also known as Yellow Rice. It is a great alternative to plain boiled rice and accompaniment for any main course, be it vegetarian or meat-based. 

Ingredients:
  • 2tbsps oil/ghee
  • 1 Onion- chopped finely
  • 1cup Green peas
  • 2cups Basmati rice
  • 3cups water
  • 1/2tsp Turmeric powder
  • Salt to taste
  • 1/2 cup warm water
Method:
  • Wash the Basmati rice well in running water and keep aside to soak for 30 minutes.
  • Heat the oil in a deep heavy-bottomed pan. When it is hot add the onions and cook till soft.
  • Add the peas and stir well.Add the rice and fry for 2 minutes.
  • Add the 3 cups of water, turmeric and salt to taste to the rice and set it up to boil on a medium flame.
  • Once the water comes to a boil, reduce the flame to a simmer and cover the pan.
  • Cook till the water seems to have almost disappeared - tiny holes will form on the surface of the rice.
  • Add the 1/2 cup of warm water all over the top of the rice and cover the pan again. Simmer for another 5-7 minutes and turn off the fire.
  • Allow the rice to sit for 10 minutes and serve.

post.title: LIVER MASALA(KALEJI MASALA)
post.content:
Liver masala recipe is one of the spicy side dish. In local words it is also called as Khaleji masala.Liver is great for blood formation.

Ingredients:
  • Liver 1/2 kg,
  • Onion 1 large,
  • Ginger paste 1 tsp,
  • Red chilli powder 1/2 tsp,
  • Corriander powder 1 tsp,
  • Turmeric 1/2 tsp,
  • Corriander leaves, green chilies and garam masala for garnishing,
  • Dry Fenugreek leaves 1/2 tsp
  • Curry leaves
  • Salt to taste,
  • Oil 1/4 cup
  • Yogurt-optional
Method:
  • Slice onions and fry them till golden brown and add curry leaves.
  • Add the liver pieces(cut into small cubes), ginger/garlic paste, red chilli powder, corriander powder,turmeric and salt.
  • Add some water if needed and bring to boil.Simmer till done.
  • Add some yogurt and fenugreek leaves at the end and stir it on medium high until it leaves oil.
  • Sprinkle corriander leaves, sliced green chilies and garam masala.
  • Serve hot with naan or roti.

post.title: TRIPLE BERRY SMOOTHIE
post.content:
Berries are nutritious and low in calories.I have used three types of berries in this smoothie but you can try this with any berries that you have on hand. Start your day with a glass of smoothie and add berries to your diet for a healthy life style.

Ingredients:
  • 1/2 cup each Fresh Strawberries, Blackberries and Raspberries
  • 1/2 cup Low fat flavored yogurt or 1/2cup vanilla ice cream
  • 2 tbsp Honey
  • 1/2 cup of ice cubes
  • 1 cup of milk
Method:
    • In a blender, add all the berries along with ice cubes, half of the milk, honey and yogurt or ice cream and blend until smooth.
    • Add the rest of the milk if it is too thick. Pour it in a tall glass and enjoy your smoothie.
    • You can garnish with fresh fruits and mint leaves.

Enjoy :)

post.title: UPMA
post.content:
Here is the super simple upma recipe that you can have for breakfast. It's very delicious and easy to make.

Ingredients:
  • 1tbsp Channa dal
  • 1 Ginger slice-chopped
  • 1 Onion small -chopped
  • 1tsp Cumin seeds
  • 8 Curry leaves
  • 2 Green chillies
  • Hing pinch
  • 1/2tsp Mustard seeds
  • 1tbsp Oil or butter
  •  Peanuts
  • Salt to taste
  • 1cup Sooji/Semolina/Upma Rava
Method:
  • In a pan add oil,add mustard seeds,cumin seeds once they splutter add channa dal ,peanuts and saute till they are cooked.
  • Now add chopped ginger,chillies curry leaves, hing add salt and water bring it to boil.
  • Next add upma rawa/semolina/sooji slowly stirring continously so to avoid lumps and mix well.When all the moisture is absorbed cover for 5 minutes and serve hot with chutney or pickle.

post.title: GULAB JAMUN-Diwali special
post.content:
Wishing you all a very Happy and Safe Diwali!!!May this festival fill with light and fun :).Here is the special diwali treat for all.Enjoy!!

Gulab jamuns are an Indian version of donuts immersed in the warm sweet syrup. Served as a dessert, this is a staple in most parts of India.

Ingredients:
  • 4 tbsp Nido or any other powder milk
  • 1 tsp baking powder (level/plain)
  • 2 tsp Semolina (sooji)
  • 1 medium Egg
  • 1 tbsp Oil
  • 1 3/4 cup Sugar
  • 2 cups Water
  • 4 coarsely Grounded Cardamom seeds
  • few sliced Almonds and Pistachio
  • Oil for deep-frying
Method:
  • Prepare Sugar Syrup:
    • In a large pan, add water, sugar, and ground cardamom seeds and bring it to a boil.
    • Stir the syrup until the sugar is dissolved.Set the syrup aside.
  • Make Gulab Jamun:
    • In a bowl, mix milk powder,semolina and baking powder.Add oil and egg and mix well.
    • Let the dough sit for a few minutes. The dough should be soft. Add more milk powder to the dough if you are adding large egg.
    • Knead the dough. Grease your hands with oil before working with the dough.
  • Divide the dough into 10 to 14 equal portions and roll them into round balls.
  • Heat the oil in a frying pan on medium heat. The frying pan should have at least 1 inch of oil. To test if the oil is the right temperature, place a small piece of dough into the oil; it should take a minute to rise. If dough rises faster, oil is too hot; if dough just sits without rising, oil is not hot enough.
  • Place the gulab jamuns in the frying pan. The gulab jamuns will expand in double the volume, so give them enough space.
  • It should take about 7 minutes to fry the gulab jamuns. While frying keep rolling the gulab jamuns around so they are evenly browned. Fry until the gulab jamuns become dark brown.
  • Let the gulab jamuns cool off for a few minutes before placing in the hot syrup.
  • The gulab jamuns should sit in the hot syrup for few minutes prior to serving.

post.title: POTATO MUTTOR CURRY
post.content:
If you're in a rush but want something tasty and wholesome to eat, this is the dish for you. Potato muttor curry is a great lunch or dinner dish and is perfect with freshly made puris or fried Indian bread.

Ingredients:
  • 2tbsps Oil
  • 1tsp Cumin seeds
  • 2 Green chillies slit
  • 1 Onion diced
  • 1tsp Ginger and Garlic paste
  • 2 Tomatoes diced
  • 2tsps Coriander powder
  • 1tsp Cumin powder
  • 1/2tsp Turmeric powder
  • 1tsp Red chilli powder
  • 1tsp Dry mango powder-optional
  • 1tsp Garam masala
  • Salt to taste
  • 5-6 Potatoes- peeled and cut into cubes
  • 1 cup Peas -(you can use frozen peas as well)
  • Coriander leaves-finely chopped to garnish
Method:
  • In a wok/pressure cooker heat the oil and add the cumin seeds to it when hot.Once they sizzle and turn slightly darker add the green chillies and then the onions.
  • Saute the onions till they turn soft.Add the ginger and garlic pastes and saute for another minute.
  • Add the tomatoes, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric, red chilli and raw mango powders and saute for a minute.
  • Last of all add the potatoes and peas and half a cup of water.Add salt to taste.
  • Cover the pan and cook till the potatoes are soft.
  • When the potatoes are cooked, turn off the stove,sprinkle the garam masala over the dish and cover immediately.
  • In a few minutes open, garnish with the finely chopped coriander leaves and serve.

post.title: VEGGIE CUTLET
post.content:
A healthy,tasty and nutritious cutlet These easy vegetarian patties are great for a snack or as an appetizer. Serve with ketchup or Indian style mint chutney on the side.

Ingredients:
  • Potatoes -2 medium
  • Mixed vegetables (green peas, carrots, green beans) 1cup chopped
  • Onion 1 chopped fine
  • Coriander-finely chopped
  • Green Chillies – to taste, finely chopped
  • Chopped ginger 1 teaspoon
  • Salt (adjust to your taste)
  • Red chilli powder 1/2 tsp(adjust according to heat level desired)
  • Coriander powder 1/4 tsp
  • Cumin powder 1/4tsp
  • Oil to fry
  • For Coating:
    • 3 tbsp maida or all purpose flour mixed into a paste with 3 tbsp water (approx.)
    • 2 slices of bread, toasted dry on a skilled and powdered or 1 cup breadcrumbs
Method:
  • Boiled the potatoes until they are tender.Once cooked, drain the water and let the potatoes cool down.Peel the skin off and mash the potatoes.
  • Steam the chopped mixed vegetables.Make sure to squeeze the vegetables to take the excess water out and Pat dry.
  • Mix all the ingredients togather; adjust salt and pepper to your taste.
  • Add 4 tablespoons of water to the All Purpose flour to make a batter and keep aside.
  • With oiled hands, divide the mixture into equal parts.Shape into flat round patties about 1/2 inch thick.
  • Place each patty in the flour-water mixture and coat well. Then place on the bread crumbs and coat well.
  • Heat the oil on medium high heat in a frying pan. Frying pan should have atleast 1 1/2 inch of oil. To check if the oil is ready, put one drop of batter in the oil, the batter should come up right away.
  • Shallow fry until golden brown on both sides. Serve hot with ketchup.

post.title: TOMATO PULAO
post.content:
Tomato Pulao is a tasty tangy rice dish that is just delicious and taste great when paired with raita.

Ingredients:
  • 2cups basmati rice
  • 3cups Water
  • 1 Onion chopped
  • 2 tomatoes chopped with the peel on
  • 1/2cup tomato paste
  • 1tbsp yoghurt
  • 1/2tsp Turmeric powder
  • 1/2 tsp Coriander powder
  • 1/2 tsp Shahzeera
  • 1/2 tsp ginger-garlic paste
  • 1/2 tsp pepper
  • 2 sticks of Cinnamon
  • 2 Cloves
  • 2 Cardamons
  • Salt to taste
  • Coriander-finely chopped
  • 2tbsp ghee
  • 2tbsp oil
Method:
  • Wash and soak the rice for half an hour.
  • Take a pan and add the oil and ghee .Then add the spices;shahzeera,cinnamon sticks,cloves,cardamons and pepper.
  • Once they splutter in the oil,add chopped onions and fry them till they are translucent.Then add turmeric and coriander powder.
  • Then add ginger-garlic paste,chopped tomato,tomato paste and yoghurt.
  • Cook until the mixture thickens and add water and salt.As soon as the water boils,add rice by draining the soaked water.
  • Sprinkle a few coriander leaves and let it cook on medium flame by stiring now and then.
  • When you find very little water left,reduce the heat and cook with lid on.
  • Once the rice is cooked.Serve hot.

post.title: FRUIT TRIFLE-Eid Special
post.content:
Wishing you all a very Happy Eid!!!Hope you have a fun day with family & friends.Here is Eid special Dessert for all my lovely people:)

Fruit Trifle is a fantastic dessert any time of year, but especially when the fruit ingredients are in season.This is the easy and tasty dessert.

Ingredients:
  • Milk 1l
  • Condensed Milk/Milkmaid 1/2cup
  • Chocolate cake
  • Vanilla custard powder 1tbsp
  • Sugar as taste
  • Fruits-pineapple chunks,apple,strawberries,blueberries ,cherries or any fruits.
Method:
  • Make Custard
    • Take a saucepan;add milk and bring to boil and then add sugar.
    • Add condensed milk or milkmaid.
    • Next in a small cup add custard powder and little milk and stir continuously to avoid lumps.
    • Add this custard to the boilng milk and stir well on high flame.Cook until it becomes a little thick in consistency.
    • Remove from stove and let it cool down.
  • In a deep, clear glass dish or trifle bowl, spread a layer of chocolate cake chunks.You can spinkle a little orange juice on the cake to keep it moist
  • Scatter the cake with chopped strawberries and apples,pineapple chunks or any fruit of your choice. And then pour the custard thus forming the first layer.
  • Repeat again by layering the cake and then scatter some fruits and then pour custard.
  • Decorate the dessert with strawberries,blueberries or any fruits.
  • Refrigerate for one hour and Serve.

Enjoy this festive dessert with your family and friends:)

post.title: DAHI KI KHADI
post.content:
Dahi KI Khadi with plain rice is a delicious Indian recipe served as a curry.

Ingredients:

  • Ingredients for Kadi
    • 2 cups Yogurt
    • 1 Onion-chopped
    • 4-6 Green chilies
    • 1/4 tbsp Turmeric powder
    • 1 tbsp Ginger paste & Garlic paste
    • Salt to taste
    • 3 tbsp Gram Flour(Besan)
    • 5-6 Curry leaves
    • 2 - 4 Garlic Cloves
  • For seasoning (Baghar)
    • 4 tbsp Oil
    • 1 tbsp Cumin seeds (Zeera)
    • 1 tbsp Black mustard seeds (Rai)
    • 2-4 Garlic Cloves
    • 2 Dried Red chillies
    • Few Curry leaves
  • Ingredients for Pakoda(Fritters)
    • 1 cup Gram Flour(Besan)
    • 1 tbsp Red Chili powder
    • 1/4 tbsp Turmeric powder
    • 1/2 tbsp Baking Soda
    • 1 tbsp Ginger paste & Garlic paste
    • Coriander leaves-finely chopped
    • Mint leaves-finely chopped
    • 1/2 tsp Coriander powder-optional
    • Salt to taste
    • Oil for frying

Method:

  • Make Pakodi(Fritters):
    • In a bowl add gram flour, salt,ginger and garlic paste, red chili powder,turmeric powder,coriander powder and baking soda. Mix well and make a smooth paste by adding water gradually.
    • Heat oil in a frying pan for frying pakodas. Use your hands or spoon to pick a small amount of pakoda mixture and drop it in hot oil.
    • Fry them on medium flame until they turn golden brown in color from all sides. Take them out once they are ready and switch off the stove. You can keep them on tissue paper to drain excess oil.
    • Keep them aside.
  • Make Kadi:
    • In a large bowl add the yoghurt; beat it with the spoon or a whisk to make it smooth.
    • Then in a small cup add water mix gram flour without lumps.Pour over into the yoghurt mix it well without lumps
    • Add ginger & garlic paste, turmeric powder, salt, and mix it well.
    • In a large cooking vessel pour yoghurt mixture over a tea net to trap all of the loose mixture.
    • Then add sliced onion, green chillies,curry leaves and garlic cloves and leave it on for low heat till its thick paste.
    • Stir often to prevent burning, if required, add little water/gram from time to time prevent from burning.
    • Once cooked drop the pakodas into it.
    • Now it's time to add the final punch by adding the tadka.You need to add this just before serving.
    • Heat oil in a small frying pan on medium flame. Once it is hot (in approx 30 seconds), add cumin seeds, black mustard seeds, garlic cloves, dried red chlilies and then switch off the stove.
    • Immediately add this tadka to your khadi and mix well.
    • Your delicious Khadi Pakoda is ready to enjoy with Rice or with Naan/Chapati/Paratha.

post.title: CHICKEN CURRY
post.content:
An easy Chicken creamy curry must must try it.

Ingredients:
  • Chicken 1kg
  • Oil 1/2cup
  • Onion-1 medium finely chopped
  • Ginger and Garlic paste 1tbsp
  • Yogurt 1cup
  • Red chilli powder 1tbsp
  • Coriander powder 1tsp
  • Garam masala powder 1/2tsp
  • Dried fenugreek leaves 1tsp
  • Heavy cream 2tbsp
  • Salt to taste
  • Green chillies 2-3
  • Coriandar leaves-finely chopped
Method:
  • Wash and marinate the chicken with ginger and garlic paste,salt,red chilli powder,garam masala powder,coriander powder,yogurt,and fenugreek leaves.
  • Heat the oil and saute the chopped onions for 2-3minutes.
  • Add the chicken and mix well.Let it cook for few minutes.
  • Next pour a glass of water and cook on medium heat until all the water dries up and it forms a thick gravy.
  • Add cream, mix and cook well for two minutes and garnish with green chilli rings and coriander leaves.

post.title: OREO MILKSHAKE
post.content:
No matter how you put Oreo Cookies and ice cream together,you know it’s going to be good.This cool,creamy and chocolaty treat is case in point:)

Ingredients:
  • 1/4 cup cold milk
  • 1/2 cup chocolate syrup
  • 2 cups Vanilla ice-cream
  • 14 Oreo Cookies
Method:
  • Crush 14 of the cookies coarsely;place in blend container.
  • Add milk,vanilla ice cream and chocolate syrup.
  • Cover and blend until smooth.
  • Pour into glass.Top it with scoop of ice cream and a cookie.
  • Serve immediately.

post.title: DREAMWHIP FRUIT TRIFLE
post.content:
A light, fresh, and cool dessert.Easy Recipe,Perfect for Parties.

Here is the image of the Dreamwhip whipped topping mix packet

Ingredients:
  • 2 Envelopes Dream whip Whipped topping mix
  • 1 tin Nestle cream
  • 1 tin Fruit Cocktail or fresh fruits of your choice
  • 10 Bread slices
  • 1/2 cup Sugar
  • 1 cup Water
Method:
  • Beat the dream whip whipped topping mix and nestle cream and set aside.
  • Prepare the Sugar syrup-Take a saucepan and boil the water and sugar until the sugar dissolves completely and keep aside.
  • Take 10 slices of bread and cut all the brown sides of bread and cut into small cubes.
  • Now dip each bread cube into the sugar syrup and place it in the flat glass dish and then pour a layer of beaten dreamwhip on bread and then put some fruit cocktail.
  • Next form the second layer by placing the bread cubes dipped in sugar syrup ,then pour the dreamwhip and then top it with fruit cocktails.
  • Refrigerate for 4-5 hours and Serve chilled.
  • Enjoy the dessert:)

post.title: KHEEMA
post.content:
Kheema or mince can be made with any meat you prefer. It is extremely versatile.Kheema tastes delicious with Chapatis or Parathas.

Ingredients:
  • Minced Meat 1/2 kg
  • Potatoes 2,cubed
  • Onions 2, large (thinly sliced)
  • Tomatoes 3, medium (roughly sliced)
  • Ginger and Garlic Paste: 1 1/2 tbsp
  • Salt to taste
  • Red Chilli Powder 1tbsp  or as to taste
  • Turmeric Powder 1tsp
  • Coriander Powder 1 1/2 tsp
  • Tomato Ketchup 2 tbsp
  • Green Cardamom 3-4
  • Cloves 4
  • Green Chillies 3-4, pricked
  • Coriander Leaves 1/2 bunch, finely chopped
  • Oil: 1 cup
Method:
  • In a deep cooking pan, heat oil and fry thinly sliced onion till it gets soft and transparent.
  • Stir in the cloves, green cardamoms along with ginger and ginger pastes. Now fry all till onions turn light golden brown.
  • Add in minced meat, salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and coriander powder. Stir fry till minced meat loses it's pink color. Add enough water that covers minced meat. Put on medium heat and cook till minced meat is half done.
  • Now add potatoes and tomatoes. If required, then add a little more water so that potatoes gets cooked. Stir, taste and fix salt at this point. Cover and cook till potatoes are almost done.
  • Now add in tomato ketchup and green chillies. Stir and cover on medium heat so that water is well absorbed and potatoes are nicely cooked. Lastly, stir in the coriander leaves and switch off the flame.
  • Serve hot with Paratha or Chapati or Naan.

post.title: BANANA ROYALE SUNDAE
post.content:
I had sundae at the famous ice cream shop named Oberweis.The best ice cream I have ever had,it's so rich and creamy.Banana royale sundae starts with three icecream toppings.And so I decided to make something at home similar to it. So enjoy this ice cream treat.:)

Ingredients:
  • 2 ripe Bananas
  • Strawberries
  • Vanilla,Strawberry and Chocolate Ice cream
  • Almond and cashew slices
  • Chocolate sauce/HERSHEY's hot fudge topping
Method:
    • Heat fudge topping until warm.
    • Peel bananas and cut into half lengthwise.
    • Now place 1scoop of each ice cream;vanilla,strawberry,chocolate and fruits;bananas,strawberries in one large dish.
    • Spoon hot fudge topping or chocolate sauce over the ice creams.
    • Top with almond and cashew slices or whipped cream.

Enjoy :)

post.title: CINNAMON FRENCH TOAST
post.content:
Cinnamon French Toast is the best morning breakfast.For this you can use the regular bread or the cinnamon bread.I used the regular bread. Very easy and energy toast,you have to try it.

Ingredients:
  • Bread Slices-4
  •  1/2 cup Milk
  • Eggs 3
  • Salt 1/4tsp
  • Vanilla Essence 1tsp-optional
  • Cinnamon powder 1tbsp
  • Butter 1tbsp
  • Pancake syrup or Honey
  • Whipped Cream
  • Some fruits-Banana and strawberries
Method:
    • In a bowl,whisk together the milk,eggs,salt,cinnamon powder and vanilla essence.
    • Dip a slice of bread into the mixture covering both sides.
    • In a non stick pan,melt butter and place slices of bread at a time into the pan.
    • Cook until golden brown approximately 2 minutes per side and then remove from pan.
    • Drizzle some pancake syrup or honey and whipped cream on top and serve with fruits.

Enjoy :)

post.title: TOMATO MUTTON
post.content:
A mild mutton curry, with a fragrant tomato gravy.

Ingredients:
  • 1/2 kg Mutton
  • 1 Onion -finely chopped
  • 2 Tomatoes-finely chopped
  • 1tbsp Ginger-Garlic paste
  • 1tbsp Red chilli powder
  • 1/4tbsp Turmeric powder
  • 2 Green chillies
  • 1tbsp lemon juice-optional
  • Salt to taste
  • 4tbsp oil
  • Coriander leaves-finely chopped
  • Mint leaves-finely chopped
Method:
  • Wash and marinate the mutton with ginger-garlic paste,salt,red chilli powder,turmeric powder and keep aside.
  • Take a heavy bottomed pan,add oil at medium heat and add onion;fry till they are slightly golden in color.
  • Add the marinated mutton and mix well and let it cook for few minutes.
  • Now add the chopped tomatoes and green chillies and let it cook till it gets smooth and mushy.
  • Now add water and cook until the mutton is tender.
  • Then leave it on for low heat till the thin layer of oil appears on the bottom surface and cover the pan and leave till the gravy is thick.
  • Add coriander and mint leaves.
  • Remove from heat and serve with parathas and plain rice.

post.title: CHICKEN BIRYANI-II
post.content:
This is a good recipe for a Chicken Biryani,a popular spiced Indian rice.

My hubby loved it and complimented me by saying it tasted like restaurant biryani..:).So do try out.

Ingredients:
  • 1 1/2kg Chicken
  • 4 cups Basmati Rice
  • 3 large Onions sliced
  • 2 tbsp Ghee/1 cup Oil
  • 1 1/2 cup Yogurt
  • 1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic paste
  • 2 tbsp Red chili powder
  • 1 tbsp Turmeric powder
  • 1 tsp Garam masala powder
  • 1 tbsp Green chilli paste
  • 1 tsp Ajinomoto
  • 1 tbsp Biryani Masala-grind cinnamon,cloves,cardamon and shahzeera
  • Shaan Biryani Packet-for extra taste
  • Coriander-finely chopped
  • Mint leaves-finely chopped
  • Salt to taste
  • Saffron dissolved in hot water
  • For Rice
    • 1 tbsp Shahzeera/Caraway seeds
    • 4 Black Peppercorns
    • 4 Green Cardamons
    • 2 Cinnamon Sticks
    • 2 Cloves
    • Salt to taste
Method:
    • In a large sauce pan at medium heat ,add 2tbsp ghee,add onions and fry till golden brown and keep aside.
    • In a large bowl,add the chicken and marinate with ginger-garlic paste,red chilli powder,turmeric powder,garam masala powder,ajinomoto,green chilli paste,,biryani masala,yogurt,fried onions,finely chopped coriander and mint leaves,salt and 3tbsp oil.
    • Mix the chicken well and cover and leave it for 3hours or more.
    • Next wash the rice and soak it in surlpus water for about 1/2 hour.
    • Meanwhile,in a large cooking pot or rice cooker;pour in water along with cloves,cardamon,cinnamon sticks,shazeera and salt.
    • Let it come to boil,add the drained rice.Give it a stir and let the rice cook until it is half done,2-3 minutes.Drain the rice.
    • Now take a large vessel/non stick vessel;add the marinated chicken.Spread the drained cooked rice over the chicken.
    • Spread evenly the fried onions and saffron color.
    • Then cover the vessel lid with newspaper or aluminium foil;and place a heavy weighted vessel over it so that no steam can escape.
    • Place the biryani vessel on stove and cook on low flame.
    • Allow to cook for 10-15 mins.
    • Serve the delicious biryani with dahi chutney and mirch salan.

comment.title: re: CHICKEN BIRYANI-II
comment.content: Your opinions are very strong willed.

post.title: COLD COFFEE
post.content:
Well I am not much in love with hot coffee but I enjoy cold coffee more.So here goes the cooling and refreshing coffee drink.

Ingredients:
  • 2 cups Vanilla Ice cream
  • 1/2 cup Chilled Milk
  • Sugar to taste
  • 1tbsp Coffee
  • 1tbsp Cream-optional
  • Ice cubes 2
Method:
    • In a blender, blend 2cups of vanilla ice cream,chilled milk,sugar,coffee and ice cubes until frothy and creamy.
    • Now take a glass pour the cold coffee mixture and then you can add 1 scoop of ice cream or cream on top.
    • Cold Coffee is ready to enjoy.

Enjoy :)

Note:If you don't like vanilla ice-cream,you can make the coffee by skipping the ice-cream or can use any other flavored ice-cream.

post.title: KABSA -I
post.content:
Kabsa is a tradional dish of Saudi Arabia.There are different ways to prepare but this is easiest way to prepare.It's my all time favorite and this taste great when served with chicken.

Ingredients:
  • 2cups Basmati Rice
  • 3cups water
  • 4 Green cardamons
  • 4 Cloves
  • 4 Black pepper corns
  • 1 Chicken cube stock
  • 2 Carrots grated
  • 10 Raisins
  • Oil
Method:
  • Put oil in a pan and add cloves,cardamons,black pepper corns and fry for 2-3 minutes on medium heat.
  • Add chicken cube and cook for 2 minutes.
  • Now add rice and water and cook the rice with lid on.
  • In a separate pan,add oil and fry the grated carrots for 3minutes and keep aside.And in the same oil fry the raisins for 2 minutes.
  • After the rice has been cooked,add the fried carrots and raisins.
  • Serve rice with tomato sauce.

post.title: VEG SCHEZWAN NOODLES
post.content:
Veg Schezwan Noodles are spicy,tasty and delicious Chinese dish,ready in few minutes.The easy recipe of schezwan veg noodles is here.

Ingredients:
  • 1 packet Spagethi
  • 2tbsp home made Schezwan sauce/Ching's Secret Schezwan sauce
  • 1tbsp Soya sauce
  • 1 Carrot diced
  • 1 Green bell pepper sliced
  • 1 Red bell pepper sliced
  • 1 Onion sliced
  • 1 Spring onion chopped
  • 4-5 French beans diced-optional
  • 1/4 medium Cabbage ,shredded
  • 1tbsp Vinegar
  • Minced ginger and garlic
  • 2tbsp oil
  • Salt to taste
Method:
  • Boil the water with little salt and then add the spagethi and boil them.
  • Once the noodles are done,drain the water and add sesame oil to keep the noodles soft and separate.
  • Cut all the veggies into fine julience.
  • Heat oil in frying pan.Add the minced ginger and garlic.
  • Now add all the vegetables and cook on high heat.
  • Add vinger,soya sauce and salt and stir well.
  • Add noodles and mix well
  • Serve hot and garnish with spring onions.

post.title: MINI VEG PIZZA-I
post.content:
Who doesn't love pizza with less chesse and your favorite toppings. This recipe is very easy and quick to make in a different style without making pizza dough in less time. So check out

Ingredients:
  • 2 Pizza Breads/Indian Naan
  • 2 cups Tomato sauce
  • Few Crushed Garlic
  • 1tbsp Black pepper
  • Toppings:
    • 1 Onion chopped
    • 1 Green pepper/capsicum, sliced thin or diced
    • 1 Red pepper, sliced thin or diced
    • 1 Tomatoes, sliced
    • 1/2cup Black olives
    • 1/2cup Pineapple chunks-optional
    • 1/2cup Jalapenos
    • 2 cups grated Mozzarella cheese
    • 1 cup Pizza cheddar cheese-grated
Method:
  • Place a pizza bread on the greased pizza tray. Preheat the oven to 450°F for at least 30 minutes.
  • Prepare the pizza sauce by mixing the tomato sauce,crushed garlic and black pepper.
  • Spread the pizza sauce as evenly as you can on the pizza and sprinkle the mozzarella cheese.
  • Now place your desired toppings on the pizza;don't overload the pizza with lots of toppings.
  • Again sprinkle the mozzarella and cheddar cheese on top.
  • Place the pizza in the oven and bake it in a pre-heated oven at 350'F for about 20-25mins.
  • Let it cool for few minutes after it is done.
  • If you want spicy pizza,sprinkle chilli flakes on top.
  • Enjoy the home made mini pizza with your family.

post.title: CRISPY FRIED CHICKEN
post.content:
Crispy fried chicken is a dry side dish that can be served with parathas or white rice.Its very easy to prepare and tastes good.This is regular item at my home.

Ingredients:
  • Boneless chicken/Chicken legs
  • 1 tsp. ginger-garlic paste
  • 1/2 tsp Turmeric powder
  • 1 tsp Red chili powder
  • 2 tsp Coriander powder -optional
  • Salt to taste
  • Oil-deep fry
  • Cilantro leaves (finely chopped)-garnish
  • 1 Onion (sliced long)-garnish
Method:
  • Clean the chicken and marinate the chicken with ginger-garlic paste,salt,turmeric powder,red chilli powder and coriander powder and keep aside for few hours.
  • Heat the pan and add oil and then deep fry the chicken by turning around.Serve hot
  • Enjoy the crispy fried chicken.:)

post.title: BUTTER PANEER
post.content:
Butter Mutter Paneer, also known as Paneer Makhni is the vegetarian version of the popular Butter Chicken. This dish can be served at parties and family gatherings.This goes well with naans,parathas and white rice. If you are health conscious person so reduce the intake.

Ingredients:
  • Paneer
  • 4tbsp Butter
  • 2tbsp Oil
  • 1tbsp Ginger-garlic paste
  • 1cup crushed tomatoes
  • 1tsp Red chilli powder
  • 1tsp Coriander powder
  • 1tsp Garam Masala
  • Salt to taste
  • 1/2 cup Heavy Whipping cream
  • 1cup Water
  • 1tsp Sugar-optional
  • Cilantro-to garnish
Method:
  • Cut paneer to desired shape.
  • Heat a pan and add oil and then butter.Once hot add ginger-garlic paste and saute for 2 minutes.
  • Add in the crushed tomatoes.Add the spices;coriander powder,garam masala,red chilli powder and salt.
  • Mix and cook till oil separates.
  • Add paneer and mix gently.Pour 1cup water and simmer for 5minutes.
  • Lower heat and add cream.Allow it to come to boil.
  • Add sugar and mix well.
  • Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

post.title: VANILLA SPONGE CAKE
post.content:
I baked this cake for my lovely sis's back there in India.It really turned out too good and spongy..

Ingredients:
  • Maida 2 cups
  • Eggs 2
  • Sugar 60gms
  • Vanilla Essence 1tsp
Method:
    • Firstly separate egg yolk and egg white into two separate bowls.
    • Now beat egg white with beater or whisker.
    • Take about 60 gms of sugar and add it to egg white and beat it until sugar dissolves.
    • Preheat oven to 180'c
    • Next add the egg yolk and beat it and also add 1tsp vanilla essece .
    • Now add 2 cups maida and beat well so to form the cake batter.
    • Take spatulla and mix it lightly.
    • Finally take a cake mould,spread the butter on all sides and place the batter and tap it to level.
    • Bake for about 20mins and Set for 5 mins.
    • Then cut into slices and serve with ice-cream,fruits or cherries.

Enjoy :)

post.title: FRIED MEAT
post.content:
This is a slightly spicy dry side-dish.Extremely simple,it tastes great when paired with pulao.

Ingredients:
  • Meat
  • 1 tsp Ginger-garlic paste
  • Salt to taste
  • 1 tsp Red chilli powder
  • 1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
  • 1 Onion chopped
  • 2-3 Green chillies
  • 1tsp Coriander powder
  • 1 tsp Garam Masala powder
  • Curry leaves
  • Lemon juice
Method:
  • Clean and cut the meat into even sized cubes.
  • Marinate meat with ginger-garlic paste,salt,turmeric powder,red chilli powder,coriander powder and garam masala.Keep aside atleast for half an hour.
  • Saute the onions till golden brown and then add curry leaves and green chillies.
  • Next add the marinated meat and half a cup of water.Cover and cook on low heat till the meat is tender.
  • Once the meat is well cooked, stir-fry continuously till it turns dry and dark brown in colour.
  • Once done add lemon juice and serve with onions or capsicum.

post.title: TOMATO CHICKEN
post.content:
Ingredients:
  • 1/2 kg Bone/Boneless Chicken
  • 1 Onion -finely chopped
  • 2 Tomatoes-finely chopped
  • 1tbsp Ginger-Garlic paste
  • 1tbsp Red chilli powder
  • 1/4tbsp Turmeric powder
  • 1 Garam masala powder
  • 2 Green chillies
  • 1tbsp lemon juice-optional
  • Salt to taste
  • 4tbsp oil
  • Coriander leaves-finely chopped
  • Mint leaves-finely chopped
  • Fenugreek leaves(Methi)-finely chopped-optional
Method:
  • In a large non-stick saucepan,add oil at medium heat and add onion;fry till they are slightly golden in color.
  • Add ginger-garlic paste,fry for 1min and then add tomatoes,fenugreek leaves,red chilli powder,turmeric powder,green chilli and mix well.
  • Stir till the tomatoes gets smooth and mushy.
  • Next clean and wash the chicken pieces,add it garam masala powder and mix well,without adding too much of water,until the chicken is tender.
  • Then leave it for low heat till the thin layer of oil appears on the bottom surface and cover the pan and leave till the gravy is thick.
  • Stir every 10 mins and add salt to taste.Do not cook on high heat.
  • Add coriander and mint leaves and cover.
  • Remove from heat and serve with parathas and plain rice.

post.title: POTATO AND CHEESE CROQUETTES
post.content:
Potato and cheese croquettes are golden and crispy on the outside and cheesy and creamy on the inside,which can be served as a starter or simply as an evening snack.

Ingredients:
  • 1/2kg Potatoes
  • 1 Onion chopped
  • 1green chillies finely chopped
  • 2tbsp green coriander fine chop
  • 1tsp Black pepper
  • 1tsp salt
  • 1tsp crushed red chilli-optional
  • 3tbsp cheddar cheese-grated
  • oil for frying
  • For Coating:
    • Cornflour or Maida
    • 1 egg beaten
    • 1 cup bread crumbs
Method:
    • Firstly peel,boil and mash the potatoes.
    • Now mix potatoes,spices and chopped onion,green coriander,cheese and green chilies till combined.
    • Make any shape you like;round or cylindrical shape.
    • Next coat croquettes in corn flour then in egg and in bread crumbs.
    • Take a pan,add oil.Let the oil heat and then fry the croquettes on high heat till golden brown.
    • Serve the croquettes wuth ketchup .

Enjoy it with any drink:)

post.title: HUMMUS
post.content:
Hummus is one of the most popular Middle Eastern dips,served with pita bread. This dish always reminds me of those days when I use to have with my family during weekends in Saudi. So do try this recipe.

Enjoy falafel chips dipped in hummus.Have a bite.

Ingredients:

  • 1 16oz can of chickpeas
  • 1/4 cup liquid from can of chickpeas
  • 3-5 tbsp lemon juice(depending on taste)
  • 1 1/2 tsp tahini -you can find in arab or indian grocery stores
  • 2 cloves garlic,crushed
  • 1/2 tsp salt
  • 2tbsp olive oil

Method:

  • Drain the chickpeas and set aside liquid from can.
  • Combine remaining ingredients in blender or food processor.Add 1/4 cup of liquid from chickpeas.
  • Blend for 3-5 minutes on low until thoroughly mixed and smooth.
  • Place in serving bowl;and create a shallow well in the center of the hummus.
  • Add a small amount around 1-2 tbsp olive oil in the well.
  • For a spicer hummus add a dash of cayenne pepper and garnish with chickpeas or parsley.
  • Serve immediately with fresh,warm pita bread.

Storing Hummus

Hummus can be refrigerated for upto 3 days and can be kept in the freezer for 1 month.Add a little olive oil if it appears too dry.

post.title: CHICKEN FRIED RICE
post.content:
Ingredients:
  • Boneless Chicken
  • Rice 95%cooked
  • Black pepper
  • Salt to taste
  • Cornflour
  • Eggs-2
  • Chopped Garlic
  • Chopped Onions
  • Ajinomoto
  • Veggies-Chopped Carrots,beans and muttor or can use frozen veggies
  • Soya sauce
  • Chilli garlic sauce
  • Chopped Spring onion
Method:
  • Cut boneless chicken into small pieces.Sprinkle little pepper,salt,cornflour and add 2 drops of egg.
  • Cook rice by draining .After you boil;drain away the water and spread rice on tray.
  • Next take pan,add oil and fry the chicken.
  • Next drain the oil keep only few drops of oil.Now add finely chopped garlic and saute for 10 minutes.
  • Add chopped onions and saute till transparent.Pour 2 beaten eggs and cook.
  • Next add pepper,salt,ajinomoto,chopped veggies,few drops of vinegar and soya sauce.
  • Now add the fried chicken and also the rice in batches and mix well.Remember rice should be 95% cooked and should be fluffy.
  • Add little salt,soya sauce on top.Add chilli garlic sauce and cook for few mins.
  • Garnish with chopped spring onions.

post.title: CHOCOLATE SHAKE
post.content:
This is the most tasty and yummy chocolate shake for the chocolate lovers...:)

Ingredients:
  • 1/4 cup cold milk
  • 1/2 cup Hershey's syrup
  • 2 cups Vanilla ice-cream
Method:
  • In a blender,place milk,vanilla ice cream and half cup Hershey syrup.
  • Cover and blend until smooth.
  • Drizzle hershey's syrup around the inside of the glass.
  • Pour into glass .Puddle 2 tsp of Hershey's syrup on top.
  • Serve immediately.

Enjoy..

post.title: CAPSICUM CHICKEN
post.content:
This recipe is a combination of chicken and capsicums that tastes too good.

Ingredients:
  • 1 chicken cut into 8 pcs or half a kilo of boneless chicken breast cubed
  • 2 green capsicums
  • small bunch of coriander
  • 2 green chillies
  • 300 ml youghurt (or more if you want extra gravy)
  • 1tbsp tomato paste
  • salt to taste
  • 1tbsp ginger-garlic paste
  • 1tbsp oil
  • pinch of turmeric
  • 1 tbsp garam masala
Method:
  • First cut the capsicum and add it with yoghurt,coriander and green chillies into a blender and blend until smooth.
  • Pour this mixture over the chicken and all the other ingredients tomato paste,salt ,ginger-garlic paste,turmeric and garam masala into the chicken.
  • Take a pan or cooker, add 1tbsp oil and the chicken into it and cook.
  • Simmer gently till the chicken is soft ,add coriander leaves and water if necessary (depends on the preference in consistency) and cook for few mins.
  • Remove and Serve with naan or rice :)

comment.content: nice

post.title: RUSK RABDI
post.content:
This is one of the other forms of rabdi. This was the first dish I prepared at my in-laws place;which was loved by all. 

Ingredients:
  • Milk 1L
  • Condensed Milk/Milkmaid 1/2cup
  • Cake Rusk
  • Vanilla custard powder 1tbsp
  • Sugar
  • For Decoration-strawberries,blueberries ,cherries or any fruits.
Method:
  • Layer the cake rusk in flat dish and sprinkle little milk on the rusk or you can dip each rusk in milk to keep it moist.
  • Make Custard
    • Take a saucepan;add milk and bring to boil and then add sugar.
    • Add condensed milk or milkmaid.
    • Next in a small cup add custard powder and little milk and stir continuously to avoid lumps.
    • Add this custard to the boiling milk and stir well on high flame.Cook until it becomes a little thick in consistency.
    • Remove from stove and let it cool down.
  • Next add the custard on to the layered cake rusk.
  • Decorate the dessert with strawberries,blueberries or any fruits.
  • Refrigerate and Serve.

Enjoy :)

post.title: CHOCOLATE CAKE
post.content:
Well I baked this cake on my Mom-Dad's Anniversary.Love you Mom and Dad :).

Ingredients:
  • 2cups boiling water
  • 1cup unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
  • 2 teaspoons baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup butter,softened
  • 2 1/4 cups white sugar
  • 4 eggs
  • 1 1/2teaspoons vanilla extract
Method:
    • Preheat oven to 350 degreesF(175 degreesC). Grease 3-9 inch round cake pans.
    • In medium bowl,pour boiling water over cocoa, and whisk until smooth.Let mixture cool.
    • Sift together flour,baking soda,baking powder and salt;set aside.
    • In a large bowl,cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.Beat in eggs one at time,then stir in vanilla extract.
    • Add the flour mixture alternatively with the cocoa mixture.
    • Spread batter evenly between the prepared pans.
    • Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes.Allow to cool.
    • Next spread chocolate icing on top of cake and decorate.

Enjoy :)

post.title: MANGO RASMALAI
post.content:
Ingredients:
  • Mangoes/Mango puree
  • Milk
  • Condensed Milk
  • Sugar
  • Cornflour
  • Bread
  • Water
  • For garinsh-Dry fruits
  • For decoration-grapes,oranges or any fruits
Method:
  • Take a saucepan and add milk and bring to boil.
  • Then add 2 tbsp condensed milk,half cup sugar and simmer gently.
  • Take a small cup add 1tbsp cornflour and little milk and stir continuously to avoid lumps.
  • Now add this cornflour mixture to the boiling milk and stir well.Cook till a little thick consistency and remove from flame and let it cool down.
  • Pour this milk in a flat serving dish.
  • Make Rasmalai
    • Take 10 slices of bread and cut all the brown sides of bread.
    • Take one slice of bread;dip in water of bowl and add the mango puree in the center and then make a round shape by folding the sides of bread and keep aside.
    • Repeat the same for the remaining breads.
  • Now add these bread balls to the serving dish.
  • Refrigerate and Serve.

Enjoy this yummy dessert:)

Note:If you are using mangoes;cut them into chunks and blend it in a blender to form mango puree.

post.title: CHICKEN BIRYANI-I
post.content:
Yum Yummy..:)

Biryani is a very famuous dish all over the world.There are two traditional ways of preparing the Hyderabadi Biryani and the most famous is called the"Kacchi Yeqhni" biryani.

So do try out and enjoy the mouth watering biryani.

Ingredients:
  • 1 1/2 kg Chicken
  • 4 cups Basmati Rice
  • 3 large Onions sliced
  • 2 tbsp Ghee/1 cup Canola oil
  • 1 1/2 cup Yogurt
  • 1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic paste
  • 1 tbsp Red chilli powder
  • 1 tbsp Turmeric powder
  • 1 tsp Garam masala powder
  • 2 big punch Saffron threads-optional
  • 4 tbsp Lemon juice
  • 4 Green chillies
  • Coriander-finely chopped
  • Mint leaves-finely chopped
  • Salt to taste
  • For Rice
    • 1 tbsp Shahzeera/Caraway seeds
    • 4 Black Peppercorns
    • 4 Green Cardomons
    • 2 Cinnamon Sticks
    • 2 Cloves
    • Salt to taste
  • Yellow color-I used red color
  • 2 tbsp toasted sliced almonds-optional
Method:
    • In a large bowl,add the chicken and marinate with ginger-garlic paste,Red chili powder,turmeric powder,garam masala powder,saffron,lemon,green chilies,yogurt,fried onions,finely chopped coriander and mint ,salt and oil.
    • Mix the chicken well and cover and leave it for 3 hours or keep in the fridge overnight.
    • Next wash the rice and soak it in surplus water for about 1/2 hour.
    • In a large sauce pan at medium heat ,add 2 tbsp ghee,add onions and fry till golden brown and keep aside for garnishing.
    • Meanwhile,in a large cooking pot or rice cooker;pour in water along with cloves,cardamon,cinnamon sticks,shazeera and salt.
    • Let it come to boil,add the drained rice.Give it a stir and let the rice cook until it is half done,2-3 minutes.Drain the rice.
    • Now take a large vessel/non stick vessel;add the marinated chicken with a little oil in the vessel.Spread the drained cooked rice over the chicken.
    • Spread evenly the chopped coriander,mint leaves,fried onions,toasted slices almonds,ghee and yellow color.
    • Then cover the vessel lid with newspaper or aluminium foil;and place a heavy weighted vessel over it so that no steam can escape.
    • Place the biryani vessel on stove and cook on low flame.
    • Allow to cook on low heat for 15 mins,close the heat.
    • Serve the delicious biryani with dahi chutney,mirch salan and salad.

Enjoy :)
